welcome.title: Countryzinho
welcome.subtitle: Type as many country names as you can before the timer hits zero

list.1: Start typing a country name - no need for [ENTER]
list.2: Guess as many countries as possible under the time limit
list.3: The faster you guess, more points you get
list.4: Game ends when you have entered all countries or the time runs out

start-game-modal.title: Configure your game
start-game-modal.description: Pick all the options you would like to have in your game
start-game-modal.timer-description: How long the game will last
start-game-modal.continent-description: Which continent you would like to focus on

confirm-game-restart-dialog.title: Restart Game
confirm-game-restart-dialog.description: Restarting the game will make you lose your progress. Are you sure?
